## CodeMetadata.(constructor)

Creates a metadata object. By default, set the `upgradeable` attribute, and uset all others.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(upgradeable?: boolean, readable?: boolean, payable?: boolean, payableBySc?: boolean);
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

upgradeable


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether the contract is upgradeable


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

readable


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether other contracts can read this contract's data (without calling one of its pure functions)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

payable


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether the contract is payable


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

payableBySc


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether the contract is payable by other smart contracts


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
